column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The Nu Mou culinarian needs help with a pest problem.
Place the sautéed mushroom soup as bait.
Lie in wait for the pest.
Report to the Nu Mou culinarian.
Nooo, not again! Grrr, a pox on that pest!
My, to appear before me precisely at my time of need! 'Tis as if you were a Nu Mou yourself!
It's my mushrooms─the precious mushrooms I grow with tender loving care. A dastardly pest has been laying them to waste!
It sneaks into the cave with its gluttonous, googly eyes, and devours my defenseless fungi before vanishing into the wilderness!
Rid me of the creature, I beg you! Lure it out using this bowl of sautéed mushroom soup, then strike it down!
Rid me of that dastardly pest, I beg you! Lure it out using the sautéed mushroom soup, then strike it down!
You did it! You rid me of the mushroom menace!
Now my precious mushrooms may grow in peace, and I can sleep without those googly eyes haunting my dreams.
Here is your fitting reward─no more and no less than you deserve. May it bring you much honor!
